neighbors.name: South Branch Enterprises Inc
neighbors.claims: South Branch Enterprises, Inc. is a West Virginia domestic profit corporation engaged in agriculture, with state filings explicitly noting that "all the land in the company is farm land" ([WV SOS](https://apps.sos.wv.gov/business/corporations/organization.aspx?org=349689)). The company is led by President Samuel Williams and Vice-President Kelly Williams ([WV SOS](https://apps.sos.wv.gov/business/corporations/organization.aspx?org=349689)). Samuel Williams is a prominent local business owner who served as a member of the Hardy County Planning Commission in 2020 ([Hardy County](http://hardycounty.com/files/documents/755f9260-7b5a-4bbd-8198-54e2ddbd070a.pdf)). He has demonstrated strong support for solar energy development, overseeing a significant solar installation at his separate business, South Branch Inn, which he publicly described as a "game-changer" and a method of "investing in our community" ([Partner Community Capital](https://partnercap.org/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/PCAP-2024-ImpactReport-v10-250328.pdf)). The Williams family owns a portfolio of local businesses and has deep historical roots in the South Branch Valley ([WV Living](https://wvliving.com/possibilitarians-kelly-and-sam-williams/)).
neighbors.influence_justification: President Samuel Williams is a former member of the Hardy County Planning Commission and a prominent multi-business owner (South Branch Inn, South Branch Cattle & Meat Company) with deep family ties to the area.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage Samuel Williams directly, leveraging his demonstrated interest in solar energy and his role as a community leader. Acknowledge his service on the Planning Commission and his family's agricultural heritage. Frame the project as a community investment that aligns with his previous renewable energy initiatives.

neighbors.profile_summary: Agricultural corporation owned by prominent local businessman and former Planning Commissioner Samuel Williams, who has previously installed solar on other commercial properties.
